org.apache.nutch.plugin
Interface Pluggable

All Known Subinterfaces:
FieldFilter, HtmlParseFilter, IndexingFilter, OnlineClusterer, Ontology, Parser, Protocol, QueryFilter, ResponseWriter, ScoringFilter, Summarizer, URLFilter
All Known Implementing Classes:
AutomatonURLFilter, BasicIndexingFilter, BasicQueryFilter, BasicSummarizer, CCIndexingFilter, CCParseFilter, CCQueryFilter, Clusterer, ConfigurableIndexingFilter, ConfigurableQueryFilter, ConfigurableQueryFilter.FieldQueryFilterImpl, ConfigurableQueryFilter.GroupedQueryFilter, ConfigurableQueryFilter.RawFieldQueryFilterImpl, DateQueryFilter, DateQueryFilter, ExtParser, FieldQueryFilter, FieldSetter, File, Ftp, HTMLLanguageParser, HtmlParser, Http, Http, HttpBase, JSParseFilter, LanguageIndexingFilter, LanguageQueryFilter, LuceneSummarizer, MoreIndexingFilter, MSBaseParser, MSExcelParser, MSPowerPointParser, MSWordParser, NutchAnalyzer, NutchDocumentAnalyzer, OntologyImpl, OOParser, OPICScoringFilter, PageRankScoringFilter, PdfParser, PrefixURLFilter, RawFieldQueryFilter, RegexURLFilter, RegexURLFilterBase, RelTagIndexingFilter, RelTagParser, RelTagQueryFilter, RSSParser, ScoringFilters, SiteQueryFilter, SWFParser, TextParser, TypeQueryFilter, URLQueryFilter, WaybackURLFilter, ZipParser
public interface Pluggable

Defines the capability of a class to be plugged into Nutch. This is a common interface that must be implemented by all Nutch Extension Points.

Author:
Jérôme Charron
See Also:
About Plugins, plugin package description
